item.title: The Power of Prayer
item.description:
The Power of Prayer by President Thomas S. Monson, Second Counselor in the First Presidency given in the Saturday Morning session of the 161st Annual General Conference on Sun Mar 31 1991
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: President Thomas S. Monson, Second Counselor in the First Presidency
